name: Slime & Wolf Dungeon
description:
Slime & Wolf Dungeon is a unique dungeon crawler game that let's you fight Slimes and Wolves. Your will pick up Duo-Effect skills and you will be able to map them to WASD according to your need!

Be creative and be careful not to get yourself stuck!

Press QWEASD to use the weapons.

Rotate the weapons to fit in your inventory.

Restart anytime by pressing the button in the top-right corner.

Jam Theme: Duality -> Two skill at the same time. Might be good but also might ruin your build. So think carefully :D

The Jam version ends when you find a Big Chest. Sorry we ran out of time to add a proper end screen. :(

Notes: 

  • Some assets are generated using AI (Stable Diffusion).
  • SFX are from Pixabay and Universal Sound FX
  • BGM is from Ultimate Game Music Collection
  • Animations are all hand-crafted in Godot!
